synergynet3.projector.web

Class ProjectorDeviceControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • synergynet3.cluster.clustereddevice.ClusteredDevice
      • synergynet3.projector.web.ProjectorDeviceControl

  • public class ProjectorDeviceControl
extends ClusteredDevice
    Manages the network cluster default entries for SynergyNetApp extending application.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ProjectorDeviceControl(java.lang.String deviceName)
      Creates the default shared properties of a network cluster for a device.

      Get the value of the network cluster property representing messages relating to clearing a projector.
